website_summaries.verdict: If music's your thing, you'll have Pioneer's MIXTRAX technology, which allows you to customize your sound.
pros: Easily upgrades any double DIN car stereo with an elegant multi-functional CD receiver
Easy to read and use physical controls
Bluetooth connectivity, five-band graphic equalizer, and anti-dust design
cons: A little short on functionality compared to newer multi-touch head units

customer_reviews.title: I always loved Pioneer products
customer_reviews.text: I always loved Pioneer products. They are quality products and a very respectable manufacturer. A couple of issues with this one. First, the bluetooth only works when it feels like it even after firmware update. Secondly, a lot of times, it seems the unit doesn't recognize the fact that i have answered the call and keeps beeping which forces me to hang up and call back. It also feels slightly cheap and plastic. Usb works like a charm, aux is sweet and bluetooth audio works well, when it decides to find the phone.
customer_reviews.author: SierraKilo

customer_reviews.title: Best radio for your dollar.
customer_reviews.text: This stereo is absolutely perfect. I installed this for my 2004 Ford F-150 and was in the market for a Bluetooth stereo and I seen this one and price was right so I bought it. I installed it in less than an hour and did the basic setup, it runs smoothly. Whenever I turn my ignition on the radio detects my iPhone and connects automatically. If I don't have my iTunes on it will open it for me and play my music, I never have to touch my phone at all. I have the Bluetooth mic under my steering wheel and wired through the interior access ports.
customer_reviews.author: Cincinnati Kid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, make sure to order dash kit filler
customer_reviews.text: Put this in my kid's Yaris replacing factory radio. Had to order special filler piece. Nice radio, pulls in signals well. I would buy again. There is an issue with the antenna ground, Google it to make sure harness is connected correctly, otherwise radio will under perform. Connect it correctly and it will work extremely well. This has to do with antenna boosters on modern cars. Be careful to not cut your fingers, metal can be sharp with all items like this. Veridad out
customer_reviews.author: veridad77

customer_reviews.title: Great Double Din stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Went with this because JVC and Kenwood (same company) both have a constant static/hissing being put through to the speakers. Installed with JBL GX600C in the front and a couple polk 6.5 inch in the rear. Nice and loud, no distortion. Highly recommended. Bluetooth is fantastic and works exactly as you expect. The hands free calling is very nice. The provided microphone is not the best but it works. You could easily upgrade that part as it's just plugged into a mono 3.5mm jack in the back of the stereo. I'd recommend a shotgun or directional mic to prevent ambient noise pickup or maybe just a higher quality mic would work.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Could be a bit more user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Could be a bit more user friendly. But sound quality is good and FM reception is great. Could use more power have to turn it up almost all the way to get good rich sound out of it. BT is great works as good as can be expected. Sub on and off is nice, wish it had more sub control. Good built in speaker crossover. Have almost all lows removed from speakers. The display is a bit old school but works good. Would be nice if it had a full color multifunction display with the non touch screen controls. Good all around proformance on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy! ✨😄
customer_reviews.text: So happy! Very easy to install and it looks great. So far, so good. I love how it starts to play the music on my phone as soon as I turn my vehicle on without my having to do anything. Phone calls are a breeze, though I'll have to extend the mic closer up through the sides to attach it to my visor. They give you more than enough extra cord to be able to put that thing where ever you want. Mine is currently on my steering wheel mount. In this position, people say I sound a bit too far away.
customer_reviews.author: Snarley

customer_reviews.title: An affordable, yet capable, double-din stereo with full Bluetooth phone support
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is an affordable, yet capable, double-din stereo that connects to my Android phone via Bluetooth for both calls and streaming audio. It streams audio from all the applications that I have tried, such as Pandora and Amazon Music, and can control the music application flawlessly. I would definitely recommend this as a no-nonsense stereo for people that want full Bluetooth functionality and not a lot of extra fluff.
customer_reviews.author: steven johnson

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: Recently I purchased a similar product made by Boss Audio. It all but died on me within two weeks. Today, I had this new one installed (this one from Pioneer). I'm happy to say that it is already working better than the one I had from Boss. This one might be more expensive, but for all the hassle and extra money I spent to have two systems installed in my car over the past month, it's better to spend the extra money than to deal with the hassle. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Buy for price and for use with an iPod
customer_reviews.text: This Pioneer head unit is a good value and provides clear sound through my factory speakers. The original sound system was the "audiophile" package from Ford so it has two sub woofers on the rear deck. Sound produced through the Pioneer head unit is clear and bass adjustment gives a great bottom end. The only area where I was disappointed is the CD player. While I use an iPod often, occasionally I listen to CDs and especially during set up of the unit. I went over a couple of what I consider mild bumps and the disc skipped! I was shocked, I've never had a CD skip in a head unit on mild road bumps before. Otherwise a good value.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: I keep finding new features.  Great sound and Bluetooth phone!
customer_reviews.text: I keep finding new features and abilities. Selling point for me was the ability to change the color of the displays to match my factory illumination. I bought a micro USD drive, which is barely noticeable on the front panel. I downloaded my music library, and goodbye commercials. Bluetooth phone function is clear on both ends. Remote control and iPhone app allow extensive customizing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a pretty good unit. The Bluetooth doesn't reach very far. Standing outside of the car ('96 Accord) more than about 1 foot it will start to cut out and loose connection (playing music from S7). Sounds is good, features are good. Overall I like it so far. I just finished installing it today so I may be back to update the review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: GARY MORRIS

customer_reviews.title: Good but fails and scratches
customer_reviews.text: Good but fails and scratches easily. Never had one last more than 2 years. My current has a bad bkuetooth that disconnects every 10 minutes but otherwise is solid
customer_reviews.author: JOutterbridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my Honda Accord 2005. The Bluetooth functionality works great. My device always connects automatically when I enter the car. The remote control this comes with is a great little bonus. It comes in very handy when I want to flip through the radio channels. It comes with a MIC to answer phone calls hands free - only issue is that the MIC needs to be close to you.
customer_reviews.author: Funnygirl24

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have some issues with the bluetooth connection, it is choppy sounds like a CD skipping. Also, the volume is low when connected bluetooth. But for the price its a decent setup.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Prius Gen 3
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a stock Prius Gen 3 base head unit and it's better in all respects. Great BT connectivity. The apps support is overkill, but great if you happen to use those particular apps. It does a pretty good job remembering where it was, but occasionally it will pause or switch to the wrong BT source (e.g. play Pandora when I wanted it to resume my Podcast)
customer_reviews.author: On The Water

customer_reviews.title: Quality product in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality product! Connected everything and it fired up perfectly with it’s beautiful color display. Bluetooth connectivity was flawless and sound quality on phone calls is also fantastic(though still need to test when there’s more road noise). I couldn’t be more thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my husband to install. Works well, good sound and connection for Bluetooth. I wanted something simple and easy to use. The only thing I have really needed the book for was to change the illumination. When first installed it cycled through multiple colors and was flashing which was very distracting. It's only been in my car a couple weeks but so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beeney

customer_reviews.title: ... a year and I can gladly say that I love this radio
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for over a year and I can gladly say that I love this radio. I haven’t had any problems with out. I have it installed in a 2005 Chevrolet Colorado
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sheroski

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer head unit
customer_reviews.text: Just installed about a week ago. Nice unit for the money. Lots of choices so far as audio goes. The menu takes some time trying to get everything set up right.
customer_reviews.author: Ben l.

customer_reviews.title: Grrat stereo at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit was easy to install and set up. Sound quality over my stock deck was so much improved with some simple eq tweaks. Bluetooth works like a charm and from all calls I’ve made so far the sound quality in the other end is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stereo system..
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stereo system. It was relatively easy to install and I love it. The sound is awesome..I love having the remote. The whole system is just great..
customer_reviews.author: Donald Corkum

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 2003 Mazda Miata. Fits well, sounds good, adds modern features not available in 2003 (bluetooth, USB input, etc.). Would be better if it had HD radio and a more intuitive menu system.
customer_reviews.author: JonW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful radio
customer_reviews.text: This thing works really well. It has a lot of power and sooo many functions and it fit right into my 01 Toyota 4Runner with no problem. Looks like it was meant to be. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: richard gwinn

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for any car.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this double din head unit into a 2006 Subaru Baja. Bluetooth works great on phone calls and streaming music. Sound fidelity is great better than I thought would be.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Other items required prior to installing.
customer_reviews.text: Attempted installation, but did not come with stereo installation kit and SiriusXM radio adapter as shown! Installation still pending at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This works very nicely! I had the older version of this radio and would not recommend it to anyone. The way the buttons were designed failed with use. This one the fixed the problems so they won't ever become a problem. Easy to install and it works so much better. It connects to your electronic devices so much quicker and I think it is easier use. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: rej

customer_reviews.title: Great double din head unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough install, but the mounting bracket is NOT included. It looks fantastic installed and comes with everything! Definitely Pioneer worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color setting of this radio! It sounded better than my stock stereo and it made a cute personality in my car! People got in and all they seen was pink! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great radio. It's a tad tricky to setup
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. It's a tad tricky to setup, as noted in some of the reviews. But it works great, looks great, does everything it says it will do. I'd buy it again in a second.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Southern Woman of a Certain Age

customer_reviews.title: Awesome in my '05 Nissan Xterra
customer_reviews.text: One week in and I'm very happy. So many different options for connecting my phone to it and using my apps. Such a great upgrade from my OEM stereo. Installed myself. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: I installed it and love it. The installation was easy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this stereo a few days ago. I installed it and love it. The installation was easy. It's sounds great! I make excuses so I can drive my truck to listen to it. No more listening to the only three local stations that I like. I stream music via Bluetooth from my phone and have endles music options. The sound is amazing. No need for an amp.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around, 0 issues, boosted sound quality from my factory receiver. Perfect fit with install kit, in my 01 Highlander.
customer_reviews.author: Jared_122

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my double din touch screen with this, great choice! Good audio quality. The only issue I've had so far is sometimes Pandora won't read the track info
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: i absolutely love this radio
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this radio! its user friendly and the bluetooth works very well. my truck got stolen a couple weeks ago so now i need to replace the bluetooth mic that came with it but that is my own fault. everything is great about this radio
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dunavin

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase! Looks and sounds great in the '10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase! Looks and sounds great in the '10 Highlander it was installed in! Very satisfied with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R. Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described, and was exactly what I needed. No issues at all. Really nice stereo with all the fancy options for under $120. Only downside is the display seems to be kind of faint in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Car Stereo
customer_reviews.text: fantastic car stereo! the bluetooth hands free phone works really well and sounds great. The app for iPhone to use with the stereo is super cool and easy as well. stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Haynes

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install the instruction where very easy to follow well written
customer_reviews.text: It's in my 55 Chevy pick up backed up with an amplifier to a sub woofer and four speakers sounds great also the bluetooth works great all and all it a very good buy I'm very happy with it's performance
customer_reviews.author: John Vargas

customer_reviews.title: This is a great radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio for the price. tons of features Get the right wiring harness and it installs fairly easily. BT works great with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Pete from Mass

customer_reviews.title: Very nice car stereo
customer_reviews.text: Very nice car stereo. I had installed by Best Buy with Alpine small amp and alpine speakers. Sounds tremendous! Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good working unit! I’ve got pioneer 5x7s and 2 dual 12” subwoofers hooked to it and I works great!
customer_reviews.author: bradly

customer_reviews.title: Great radio, all you need!
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for my car! Has everything you need, Bluetooth, cd, aux line in and USB to charge and plug any iPod. I would give it 5 stars but sometimes it freezes when the car starts and after a minute it powers on again...weird but anyways I'm pretty happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Works great with hands free for phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great with hands free for phone. We're in the peoples republic of Austin so had to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can take a little long to reconnect to Bluetooth but otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Liam558

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with great integration with my phone without blowing ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product with great integration with my phone without blowing a large amount of money and still have a CD option
customer_reviews.author: Miro Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio Upgrade without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something simple so that I can listen to Pandora and make hands free phone calls. This definitely met my standards. I like how you can change the display colors so that I can match the color on the rest of buttons and displays in my truck. Radio reception is good, audio quality is good as well. Bluetooth takes a bit of time to learn. But overall it's all pretty simple to operate even if you didn't read the manual. The only issue I had, if that, is the instructions didn't have color coded wiring instructions. But I've installed dozens of radios in the past so I know already where everything goes.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Valdivia

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sounds great, better than I thought it would be !!!! Easy to use, tune and play !!! Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gravel

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars if it had dedicated radio / pandora buttons
customer_reviews.text: The pioneer Dj-x731bt is a really good head unit. It has great sound quality and the ability to tune your speakers with its built in crossover. The light shows are nice but a bit gimmicky to me. The one thing that I don't like with this unit is that it has no dedicated mode buttons, so you'll find yourself pushing one single button to bet from radio to Bluetooth audio to pandora and so on. Something else that's a bit annoying is also the time between pushing a button and the unit actually responding. Kind of reminds me of dial up internet, it works but its slow.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is amazing. The colors are bright, it sounds great, and it is super easy to use and understand. It fi perfectly into my 2005 Dodge Ram and looks beautiful. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great stereo
customer_reviews.text: Only had to trim 1/8" off the top and bottom of factory dash opening to make it fit perfect. Bought an installation kit and it looks like it came from the factory with this stereo. The original speakers sound so good that I will not replace them.at this time.
customer_reviews.author: MORTER

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2004 honda civic lx
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good unit. Displeased with the display... But it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: This car stereo is wonderfull amazing and sofisticated equipment... I recomend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this radio! Decently easy to use! Love the colors and the Bluetooth works great
customer_reviews.author: laura allred

customer_reviews.title: this was install in my car for like a week then started powering on sometimes then eventually ...
customer_reviews.text: this was install in my car for like a week then started powering on sometimes then eventually only when its really cold it will work and now it does not i am so disappointed now hmm stuck with a non operational receiver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Even though it was rated the same amperage output as my stock radio, my stock speakers' quality and power easily tripled. It came quick. No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Dax D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Shipped and received exactly as promised. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin West

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, Sound Quality is very Good! Well Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne 665

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful radio and sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful radio and sounds good. However a CD got stuck in it within the first half hour of installation. Its been many weeks and I still have not been able to get it out. I have tried all kinds of remedies online, still no luck
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Best stero
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer car stereo . Good sound and very easy to install .
customer_reviews.author: Singh

customer_reviews.title: Ordered new one but got a used beat up stereo ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered new one but got a used beat up stereo scratched up and missing wures amd remote.Returning it
customer_reviews.author: jasen singh

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved his surprise
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved his surprise. He thinks the ability to do hands free phone calls is amazing in his old ford pickup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is perfect. Phone connectivity is great
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't beat it. Bluetooth is perfect. Phone connectivity is great. Channel signals could be a little better but ok!
customer_reviews.author: Rye Dog

customer_reviews.title: Best(sound quality and sound configuration capabilities) head unit that you can get at this price
customer_reviews.text: Best(sound quality and sound configuration capabilities) head unit that you can get at this price. Sadly there No rear USB, bad connection with Pioneer Android application and Bad "answer" button reaction then some one calling to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality of the sound
customer_reviews.text: Good quality of the sound. For the price I say is a really good radio. I put thes on a Hummer H3 2005
customer_reviews.author: Walter G.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my stock 05 F350 radio!
customer_reviews.text: This receiver replaced the stock one in my 05 F350 and the bluetooth is a great feature along with how easy it integrates with steering wheel controls and truck. I bought these three items so i could install it in my truck easily:
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sounds great, and looks pretty retro. Not really much more that you could ask for really. Only thing is, make sure to purchase the correct mounting bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Brien H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Very good deck. Just as advertised. Sound quality is good and it has very flexible sound setup. Some may find the controls a little complicated but there is simply no way to avoid this given the multitude of configuration options this unit offers.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fit perfect on the car along with the Metra double din mounting kit. pretty cool features aswell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB works great. Using 32GB
customer_reviews.text: Can't get my phone to work via the app, all the unit wants to do is load up pandora. I dont care about pandora. I bought this unit for phone compatibility, and it is not really there. USB works great. Using 32GB. Love the colors. This is a beautiful radio. Potentially very dangerous because of brightness and flashiness of some features.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great...just a fantastic unit....can't say more, would buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hager

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good deck. I think I got my monies worth. Easy to set up, easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Williams

customer_reviews.title: I hate this deck
customer_reviews.text: This deck sucks. It likes to turn off for no reason. Sometimes it like to connect to my phones Pandora app without even opening the app and starts playing music on my phone even if the deck is on the radio. Sometimes it doesn’t connect at all to my phone, via Bluetooth or the auxiliary cord. I despise this deck and wish I never bought it. It never works when I want it to and when I want silence it decides to connect and play stuff on my phone I don’t want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Morton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FIT 2000 Chevrolet blazer lt. I saw a review that said it did and it does not. It would fit if you cut your dash front which is ups destory your car. Also the suggested installation kit does not fit either. It was not large enough whereas the radio was too wide. It's a great radio from what I saw and would be great in a car that it fits but not my make and model vehicle
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stereo sucks wouldn't even turn on so now I have a 112$ paper weight
customer_reviews.author: William kroplin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my car. Great price for a high quality product
customer_reviews.author: Neel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product that works as intended. Great price and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: I mist have got a bad one
customer_reviews.text: MINE SEEMS TO HAVE A ISSUE WITH THE VOLUME KNOB PUSHING STATIC TO MY RIGHT FRONT CHANNEL AND LEFT REAR CHANNEL AT LOW VOLUMES. i SHOULD HAVE OPTED FOR A BETTER MODEL CONSIDERING I USE IT TO DRIVE AMPLIFIERS. The blue tooth is kind of haywire, and pandora is not connecting these days. I would like to swap it for another one
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for price.
customer_reviews.text: Man, I just installed this radio in last night and i got to say wow great radio for the price. I was blown away with the custom colors the many audio features. I thinking about buying another one for my mustang. I did use after market kenwood speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Homero Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and great bang for the buck. loving it in my accord 2000!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an upgrade in audio over the factory radio
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install many great features good looking unit. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit great with the mounting kit for an 07' Sedona
customer_reviews.text: Fit great with the mounting kit for an 07' Sedona. CD player and USB options work well, and the Bluetooth works well. The AM/FM radio is terrible though. Half the stations my OEM radio picked up are gone, and the local stations are choppy to the point I can't stand listening to it. I'm looking at a different brand instead if contacting customer service doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: C&M

customer_reviews.title: Things to ponder!
customer_reviews.text: The digital screen is hard to see during daylight hours. I don't know if a glare resistant glass or a cover can be put on it. Are use a USB storage device for music and books. I cannot seem to separate the books folder from the music folder whenever I have it all random play, I cannot seem to separate the books folder from the music folder whenever I have it all random play, therefore a segment of books comes in to the music line sometimes. Other than that the stereo seems to work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: One week
customer_reviews.text: One week and the cd player went out,everything else works. So now I have to take it out and send it back. What a pain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great head unit for noobs and pros
customer_reviews.text: This head unit is a solid choice if you're looking for something simple and easy to install. I'm a total noob and was able to install this in my Altima. The plastic is a little cheap feeling, but the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kena James

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, just but an aid
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth stops working when it's cold and works selectively when it's not. Great audio, just but an aid cord
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: I bought the cd player with intentions to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cd player with intentions to put it in right away, but got postponed due to work, when I finally got to put it in and wire it up it lit up and quit working!
customer_reviews.author: Maveric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked great my husband loved it,it paired with his iphone and worked great in his mitsubishi lancer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality item only took my 45 minutes to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality item only took my 45 minutes to set up easy to set my phone !! All and all really satisfied!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of pioneer best 2din deck it works perfect no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it work perfectly and i very happy of this buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth skips...
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the prior model to this one,the FHX-720BT, but this model has a very irritating drop-out/skip every few seconds when using Bluetooth to listen to music stored on my phone. I have tried all the "fixes" to be found on the internet, but nothing cures this problem. Same vehicle, same phone, same conditions. The only change was the receiver updated model. This is the first ever Pioneer product that disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: CRM

customer_reviews.title: do your home work before you purchase
customer_reviews.text: Stereo did not come with mounting basket or face plate trim, there is no way to mount and is not double din correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the radio
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the radio, but that's only because I'm a manual reading nerd. If you aren't a manual reader, DON'T BUY THIS ITEM. Pioneer crammed so many things in this radio, they forgot to be user friendly. I would bet anyone $40 they couldn't turn the radio with any confidence, within an hour. The unit works fine, you just won't know how to change the radio station, or turn on your bluetooth, or any function without the manual. Please note, I'm on top of most electronic items and how they function. This one was difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Toneconsultant

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Dud
customer_reviews.text: Well found this headset online saying it was one of the best headsets for the buy. Well now that my whole dash is torn apart and everything is ready to go the product doesn't work at all. Plugged in old radio and it works so i know its this POS. Spend a little extra money and buy something that the manufacture actually test their products. Could me just my luck tho I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you update the firmware.
customer_reviews.text: Update the firmware 8.30. This unit is pretty impressive for the price. Lot of menus and options still to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

customer_reviews.title: ... radio still in reading format anything else is working perfect i like it also answer call has a little ...
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are hard to press the change is slow disk to memory or radio still in reading format anything else is working perfect i like it also answer call has a little delay but works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my car.
customer_reviews.text: This pioneer unit fit perfectly on my nb mazda miata. This radio has Bluetooth, a usb input, and aux input on the front of the radio. I couldn't get the mic to function properly in any location I placed it. Overall I do recommend buying this radio, you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great radio sounds better then stock radio like the blue tooth If you are installing in a 2007 dodge ram your red wire should be wired to the hot side of the cigarette lighter There is no hot in the aftermarket plug Radio is great Like I can set what color I like and shows radio and song info
customer_reviews.author: Bill T.

customer_reviews.title: Super glitchy, Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: The radio functions work fine, but the blue tooth hands free part is terrible, it works at best half the time, and there seems to be no rhyme or reason to when it works. I would not by this unit again nor recommend it! If your just looking for a radio there are less expensive units with the same functions, and if you are looking for a unit that will allow you to legally take calls while driving this will just frustrate you. And for reference have one phone synced to this unit, one, and it still is super glitchy. I personally am steering clear of Pioneer after my experience with this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Morgan
